author: Abigail Hess
title: The 15 states with the most jobs you can do remotely
text:
Companies hiring remote workers : McKesson Corporation, PNC, SAP 6. Illinois 
Companies hiring remote workers : Goodway Group, Molina Healthcare, Pearson 5. Florida 
Companies hiring remote workers : Humana, The Hartford, UnitedHealth Group 4. New York 
Companies hiring remote workers : Accenture, American Express, Teach For America 3. Virginia 
Companies hiring remote workers : American Red Cross, CVS Health, Leidos 2. Texas 
Companies hiring remote workers : Teradata, Wells Fargo, Williams-Sonoma 1. California 
Companies hiring remote workers : Red Hat, Houghton Mifflin Harcourt, ULTA Adam Jeffery | CNBC The San Francisco Bay Area attracts some of the nation's top technology talent. 
California topped FlexJobs' list with the most remote jobs being posted for workers from the Golden State. 
Many of the states on FlexJobs' list are seeing large job growth overall, like New York and Texas. Several less expected states also reported a strong number of remote job opportunities, including Washington and Ohio. 
Arizona also made it into the top 15 this year. Several cities in Arizona have witnessed explosive job growth in 2018 including Chandler, Peoria and Gilbert.
